taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section setosi;species racemiger;

treatment.description: Very similar to no. 143, but canes clearly evident between the scattered subulate prickles (100-200 per dm.); primocane-leaves with glandless remotely prickly petioles; primocane-leaflets mostly narrower; raceme leafy-bracted only at base, its more divergent pedicels only about 2 cm. long.
